com.ufpimaps.models

Class GeoPointsDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.ufpimaps.models.GeoPointsDatabase

  • public class GeoPointsDatabase
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Classe que armazena os principais geopoints da ufpi para agilizar a busca no aplicativo. Created by HugoPiauilino on 21/05/15.
